name: Detect
effect: Reaction. Shield move. Redirect all moves targeting the target of this move to the user until the end of round. Treat the accuracy of this move as if it were the effect of the 'Dodge' action to the first redirected move. Rerolls cannot be used on accuracy rolls against the user until end of round.
description: The user focuses on the opponents intent and target, and makes a key dodge at the last moment.
